Entry.JapaneseText: ううぅ……憎い…… ヒューマが憎い……!!
ぬぅぅぅ…… うおぉぉぉぉぉッ!!
来るな…… 俺に近づくんじゃない!!
Entry.EnglishText: Stay back.... Get away from me!!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ナニやってるの!? 早くラジルダの秘薬を 持ってきてヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Don't just stand there!! Give me the Razilda Elixir, quick!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>が……<Eugene>を 早く助けてあげなきゃ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>'s... We have to hurry and save <Eugene>...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: は、早く…… ラジルダへ行って秘薬を…… <Eugene>……さんのために……
Entry.EnglishText: Quick... Go to Razilda for the medicine... For <Eugene>'s sake...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000bc>……もしかして、 あれがハック？
<voice:1d0000bf>あ、ありがとう！ 助かったよ……でも…… キミたちはここに何をしに……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000BF>T-Thank you! You really saved my hide... But... why are you here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000c0>ジベールさんに頼まれて来た。 あんたがハックだな？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000C0>Mr. Gibert asked us to come here. You're Hack, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000c2>なかなかあんたが帰って来ないから、 ジベールさんが心配していた。 何をしていたんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000C2>Mr. Gibert was worried because you've been gone for a while. What are you doing here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000c3>ごめんなさい…… ついつい調査に熱が入り過ぎてさ。 助けてくれてありがとう。 今のうちに引き上げる事にするよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000C3>I'm sorry... I got so absorbed in my research that I completely lost track of time. Thanks for saving me. I'll head back now!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000c4>これで、ジベールさんに 信用してもらえるネ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000C4>We should be able to earn Gibert's trust now!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000005><Eugene>!! <Veigue>と<Tytree>が 来てくれたヨ!! さぁ、出てきてよ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000005><Eugene>! <Veigue> and <Tytree> are here! You can come on out now!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000008>どうしたんだ？ なんでこんなところに……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000008>What's wrong? Why is he in there...?
<voice:24000009><Veigue>, <Tytree>... I need you to kill me, right now!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400000a>ちょっと待って、<Eugene>！ <Veigue>たちを呼んで来てくれって、 そういうコトだったの!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2400000A>Whoa, <Eugene>, wait! You called <Veigue> and the others all the way here for that?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400000b>そうだ……早く、一刻も早く…… 俺を殺すんだ……頼む…… <Annie>に仇を……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2400000B>That's right... Hurry, don't hesitate for second... Kill me... Please... Give Annie her revenge...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400000c>冗談じゃねえ!! 一緒に戦った仲間を 殺せるワケねえだろうが!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2400000C>Is this some kinda sick joke?! No way am I gonna kill a friend who fought by my side!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400000d>俺の心は憎しみで乱れている…… このままでは、俺は……おまえたち ヒューマを殺してしまう……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2400000D>Hatred is eating away at my mind... If this continues then I... I'll end up killing you Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400000e>限界だ……殺してくれ…… 俺を早く殺さないと…… 俺が、おまえらを……殺す…… 殺してやる!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2400000E>I can't hold out much longer... Kill me... If you don't do it soon, I...I'm going to...kill you all... I'll kill you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000010>黙れ、脆弱なヒューマめ!! 消えろ！ 消えてしまえ!! うおおおおおおぉぉぉッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000010>Shut up, you pathetic Huma! Die! Begone from this world! Uuuoooooh!
<voice:24000012>We need to get out of here!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000015>いったん外へ出て、 どうすればいいか考えるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000015>Let's get out of here for now, and then we can think about what to do.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000027>大丈夫、<Eugene>!? もう少しの辛抱だからね!! <Veigue>たちが薬を持って 来てくれるから、がんばって!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000027>Are you alright, <Eugene>?! Just hang in there a little while longer! <Veigue> and the others are gonna bring you medicine!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000091><Eugene>!! <Veigue>たちが 薬を持って来てくれたヨ!! もう安心だからさ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000091><Eugene>! <Veigue> and the others came back with the medicine! Everything's gonna be okay now...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000093><Eugene>……お願いだから…… 出てきてよ……
<voice:24000098><Eugene>、飲んで…… コレを飲めば、元に戻れるから……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000098><Eugene>, take this. You just need to take this and you'll be back to normal...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400009b>……憎い……憎い…… ヒューマは……殺す!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2400009B>I hate... I hate you... I'll kill you Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000a3>ダメ!! 錯乱してるわ!! なんとかして止めないと!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000A3>This is bad! He's completely out of control! We have to do something to stop him!
<voice:240000A4>We have no choice but to fight!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000a6>このままだと私たち、 <Eugene>に殺されちゃうわよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000A6>If we don't do anything, Eugene is going to kill us all!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000a8>気を失わせるだけでいい!! 戦え、<Mao>!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000A8>All we have to do is knock him out! You need to fight him, <Mao>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000ab>……ゲオルギアスよりも やっかいだったぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000AB>That was tougher than going up against Geyorkias.
<voice:240000AC><Mao>, give him the medicine while you have the chance!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000ae><Eugene>、飲んで…… お願い……<Annie>たちが 持って来てくれた……薬……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000AE><Eugene>, take it... Please... Annie and the others went and got it for you...
<voice:240000B3>Not that! I was asking you if it worked!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000b5>よかったぁ……よかったネ…… うわーん!!
<voice:240000b7><Eugene>がいなくなっちゃったら どうしようかと思ったんだから!! だってボク……ボク……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000B7>I don't know what I would do if I were to lose you, <Eugene>! So I... I...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000b9>……そうか。 やはり、俺以外にも 変化が起こっていたか……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000B9>...I see. So I'm not the only one who's had something happen to them.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000ba>何か心当たりがあったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000BA>Do you have any idea what could have happened?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000bb>……俺は今まで、種族というくくりで 相手に憎しみを抱いた事はなかった。 しかし、あの儀式の後から 俺の精神は常に高ぶっていたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000BB>My whole life, I had never felt any hatred towards anyone based on their race. However, after the ritual, I felt like I was constantly on edge.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000bc>ゲオルギアスとの死闘の影響で 興奮がおさまらないのだろうと 思っていた……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000BC>I had thought that perhaps I was still worked up after that intense battle against Geyorkias.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000bd>だが……違った…… ヒューマを見るたび、話すたび、 ひとつの感情が俺の心を支配した。 ヒューマが憎い……奴らを殺せと!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000BD>But... I was wrong. Every time I saw a Huma, talked to a Huma, there was only one thing on my mind -- That I hate Huma, and that I ought to kill them!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000be>いくら考えても、急な変化の 原因の心当たりはなかった。 だが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000BE>No matter how hard I thought about it, I couldn't think of a reason for my sudden change in attitude. However...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000bf>ゲオルギアスが復活した時のコト 覚えてる？ あの時、ゲオルギアスは 自分の使命はヒューマのせん滅だって 言ったよネ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000BF>Do you remember when Geyorkias was revived? He said that his mission was to eradicate Huma, didn't he?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000c0>それが今回のヒューマへの憎しみと どう関係しているのかはわからない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000C0>I'm not sure how that would have anything to do towards my sudden hatred of Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000c1>だが俺の異変は あの儀式の後に起こった事だ。 何かゲオルギアスと 関連があるのかもしれない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000C1>But there might indeed be some sort of connection, considering that I started behaving abnormally after the ritual.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000c2>……ゲオルギアスね。 調べてみたけど……お手上げ。 ほとんど情報はなし。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000C2>Geyorkias, huh... I tried doing some research, but I've given up. There's practically no information about him.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000c3>俺たちもあの儀式の後、 ゲオルギアスの名前が 気になって調べてみたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000C3>We were also curious about him, so we decided to look into it ourselves.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000c4>前にこの洞窟で助けた ハックっていう考古学の勉強を してた人がいたでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000C4>You know how that guy we rescued in these caverns, Hack, was doing some archeological research here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000c5>あの人が<Blue>聖なる王<White>の事を 話してたのを思い出して、 聞きに行ってみたんだヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000C5>Well, we remembered how he mentioned something about a <Blue>Sacred King<White> so we decided to go ask him about it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000c6>そしたらなんと、 この洞窟が<Blue>聖なる王<White>、 つまりゲオルギアスに ゆかりのある場所だって。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000C6>Apparently the <Blue>Sacred King<White>, who we now know is Geyorkias, has some kind of connection to these caverns.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000c7>……まさに調査を始めようとした 矢先に、俺がああなった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000C7>...Just as we were about to begin conducting our investigation, I started having problems.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000c8>それで、俺はこの洞窟にこもったんだ。 誰かを殺してしまう前に…… 俺を殺してくれる相手が来るのを 待つために……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000C8>That's why I had locked myself away in the caverns. I was waiting for someone who could come and kill me... Before I killed anyone myself.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:240000c9>よって、調査の方は まだほとんど手付かずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:240000C9>We made little progress in our investigation because of that.
<voice:240000CA>Well, let's give it another shot then, shall we?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000087>俺の心は憎しみで乱れている…… このままでは、俺は……おまえたち ヒューマを殺してしまう……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000087><voice:2400000D>Hatred is eating away at my mind... If this continues then I... I'll end up killing you Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000024>……違う…… あなたは違うでしょ!? そうじゃないの!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000024>No...! You would never do something like that! Am I not right?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000088>黙れ、脆弱なヒューマめ!! 消えろ！ 消えてしまえ!! うおおおおおおぉぉぉッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000088><voice:24000010>Shut up, you pathetic Huma! Die! Begone from this world! Uuuoooooh!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
